Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product worth $800,000 at a competitive advantage, tailored to meet your specific needs. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
